package.name: iOS X theme
package.shortDescription: Theme your iDevice like a Mac

descriptionlist.description: Theme your iDevice like a Mac. There are alternate icons and folder icons one can manually set up by going into the IconBundles folder and changing the icon names.

I and the repo maintainer do not own the images provided in this theme. Stock Apple apps are copyrighted by Apple. This theme is free and always will be. If you see this theme being sold anywhere else please contact me as this is not the intention of this theme.
